page.title: 15A DAY IN TORTHORWAD
page.content: {7.45am}Get up. Make beds and tidy bedrooms. Make breakfast & get Mandy off to school. {9.00am}Go to shop. Have a cup of tea and look at paper {9.30am}Wash dishes and clean up kitchen.Go to town for shopping {12 Noon}Get bus back home. Put shopping away. Have lunch. Light fire. {12.30pm}Put washing machine on, Hoover & dust in between washing. Hang out washing. Have another cup of tea. {3.30pm}Collect Mandy from school. Perhaps chat to neighbour. {4.00pm}Prepare tea (peel potatoes etc) {5.30pm}Tea_time. Wash dishes and clean up kitchen. {6.30pm}Watch TV while ironing. Put ironing away and look out clean clothes for morning {8.30pm}Make supper and tidy up sitting room. Watch TV. Go to bed about 11pm.
